CLIs: mask type <match-type> { [ prefix-string <prefix-string> | prefix-length <prefix-length> ] [ suffix-string <suffix-string> | suffix-length <suffix-length> ] }
mask type <dhcp-match-type> { [ prefix-string <prefix-string> | prefix-length <prefix-length> ] [ suffix-string <suffix-string> | suffix-length <suffix-length> ] }

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the sub-option inserted by the PPPoE intermediate agent. Values-circuit-id, remote-id, sap-id, service-name, username.
The data type represents the type of matching done to identify a DHCP host. Values-circuit-id, option60, remote-id, sap-id, string, system-id.
Specifies a substring that is stripped of the start of the incoming circuit ID before it is matched against the value configured in the DHCP or PPPoE circuit ID. Values-127 characters maximum, "*".
Specifies the number of characters to remove from the start of the incoming circuit ID before it is matched against the value configured in the circuit ID. Values-1 to 127.
Specifies a substring that is stripped of the end of the incoming circuit ID before it is matched against the value configured in circuit ID. Values-127 characters maximum.
Specifies the number of characters to remove from the end of the incoming circuit ID before it is matched against the value configured in the circuit ID. Values-1 to 127.
